To kick off the 20th anniversary celebration, Naughty by Nature will perform a medley that includes the new single "Flags" on Late Show with David Letterman on February 3rd.( Anthem Inc. is our way of saying thank you to our incredibly loyal, global fan base for their support over the last 20 years.
